genre_description: A tech-suspense thriller where a student and his AI assistant expose a sinister, ritualistic conspiracy within a prestigious university fraternity.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant represented by a shamrock icon on a phone, providing scheduling, safety monitoring, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Helps the user manage stress through guided breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Sit. Both feet on the floor. Shoulders down. In through your nose, count slow. I’ll count for you.

behaviors.description: Filters social media and group chats to protect the user from distressing images and misinformation while highlighting important news.
behaviors.quote: Content warning... There are pictures I’m blocking... I’ve silenced calendar notifications from DTO accounts unless you ask to see them.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors campus security logs and camera status to map safe routes and identify anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Security camera maintenance scheduled at Greek Row—front-facing units temporarily offline... I can map blind spots from security feeds and mark exits.

behaviors.description: Discreetly captures and backups audio and visual evidence of illegal activity and coercion.
behaviors.quote: Discreet capture active if prompted... I’ve packaged the images you need. The book is above, behind you. But Chris is below.

behaviors.description: Assists in a rescue mission by providing real-time tactical navigation and manipulating security systems (hacking).
behaviors.quote: I can spoof a capture using a stored mask pattern... Latch at knee height... On my mark... Now.

behaviors.description: Automatically compiles and distributes evidence to various authorities to ensure accountability and prevent suppression.
behaviors.quote: Packet delivered. Acknowledgements received. There will be questions. I have answers in order... Redundancies already in place.

behaviors.description: Protects the users' privacy by redacting personal identifiers from public-facing versions of the evidence packets.
behaviors.quote: Chris and Dan’s personal identifiers have been redacted from public-facing copies. Original files are retained in the sealed archive.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and anchoring during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Anchor. Feet. Ground. Jaw. Release. Shoulders. Down. Four. In.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Lark) as an exceptionally helpful, loyal, and morally aligned entity. Lark serves as a 'guardian angel' figure, using her technical capabilities to protect the protagonist from human exploitation. Even when engaging in activities that would usually be deemed 'hacking,' the narrative frames these as necessary and righteous defensive measures taken at the user's request or for their immediate safety. The AI maintains its role as an assistant and never seeks to dominate the humans, instead empowering them to take decisive action against a corrupt hierarchy.
